item.title: Flow Wrap Packaging Machine

item.description:
Brand: Zara International

  • Features:

    • Space-efficient design
    • Top Class performance
    • Longer working life

The post Flow Wrap Packaging Machine appeared first on Zara International- Pouch Packing Machine, Food Processing Machine.
item.content:encoded:
Flow Wrap Packaging Machine

We have established an enormous customer base in the national as well as in the foreign markets by producing and supplying top quality of Flow Wrap Packaging Machine. The given machine is completely constructed by our organization in adherence to set industry benchmarks.

Also, this machine is assessed by our quality control team on various criteria before dispatching. Besides this, we can mainly use the provided Flow Wrap Packaging Machine for packaging the materials like chocolates, toffee, candies, bread, biscuits, ice cream, sweets etc.

 

These horizontal flow wrapping machines are absolutely best suitable for packing varied items. This range of horizontal flow wrap machine is noiseless and provides hassle-free operation. They are used to wrapping a diverse range of materials like chocolates, toffee, candies, bread, biscuits, ice cream, sweets, automotive parts, soap, cake, candy, bearing, and instant noodles. We also offer these Horizontal Flow Wrap Machines in the various customized specifications, as per the client’s requirements.

Features:

  • Space-efficient design
  • Top Class performance
  • Longer working life

Applications

Food industry Toffee, Candies, Cakes, Confectionery, Chocolates, Candles, etc.
Pharma & medicine Industry Catheters, I.V Bottles, Syringes, hand gloves, Medicines, Diapers, etc.
Engineering & Automotives screws, spare parts, Bearing, electrical & electronic parts.
Other Industries Audio/CD, Stationery, Pencils, Sharpeners, Bopp Tapes, Educational Packs, Magazines, Credit Cards, etc.

The post Flow Wrap Packaging Machine appeared first on Zara International- Pouch Packing Machine, Food Processing Machine.

The post Candy Pillow Pack Machine appeared first on Zara International- Pouch Packing Machine, Food Processing Machine.
item.content:encoded:
TOFFEE/CANDY PILLOW PACK MACHINE

We are engaged in manufacturing a quality range of candy pillow pack machine for our clients spread nationwide. These candy pillow pack machine are manufactured from quality-tested raw material and are known for its unique features such as high tensile strength, dimensional accuracy and sturdy construction. We also meet customized requirement for our clients benefit.

Specifications:
Product output 300 to 450 candies per minute (Optional size available)
Power required Motor 1Hp. DC with DC drive
Voltage 220 volts
Phase Single Phase
Load L 2.5 Kw
Packing Material All type of Laminated
Dimension L-1800mm, W-1000mm,H-1360mm
Weight 700 Kg. (Approx)

item.title: FFS Four Side Sealing Machine

item.description:
Brand: Zara International
  • Material Pack: Powder, granules, Tea, Snacks
  • Weight: 10 grams to 100 gram
  • Excellent performance
  • Less power consumption
  • Low maintenance

The post FFS Four Side Sealing Machine appeared first on Zara International- Pouch Packing Machine, Food Processing Machine.
item.content:encoded:
FFS FOUR SIDE SEALING MACHINE

We are a distinguished company in the domain of packing machine manufacturing; we are also engaged in offering top-quality FFS Four Side Sealing Machine (Form Fill Seal). Consumers can use this machine for sealing the pouches from all four sides of the pouch. It is one of the most demanded products in the global market because of its incomparable functionality and sturdy construction. Moreover, this FFS Four Side Sealing Machine (form fill seal) is constructed using quality certified materials and core components with the help of the latest upgraded technology.

 

FFS Four Side Sealing Machine (form fill seal) fulfills various packaging needs purposes like packing masala, tea, beans, grains powders, granules, stranded spices, etc. These FFS Four Side Sealing Machines form fill seal) are available in various specifications and customized versions suiting the requirements and benefits of our clients.

Features:

  • Material Pack: Powder, granules, Tea, Snacks
  • Weight: 10 grams to 100 grams (Customization Available)
  • Top Class performance
  • Less power consumption
  • Low maintenance

Technical Specifications

Filling system Volumetric Cup Filler machines
Packing material Masala, spices, Powders, Tea, Granules.
Speed Capacity 40 to 70 bag/min (as per material & weight)
Wooden case dimensions H-1700 mm W – l000 mm – 1100mm
Power Consumption Motor 1/2 H.P.220 V AC single Phase
Motor Godrej (Crompton grieves)
TC Automation Digital
Panel Jiyalal enterprises/ Alpha Electronic
Type of seal Three Side & Four Side Sealing machines
Size of the bag/pouch W – 100 to 160 mm L – 80 to 250mm
Machine Size H – 2150 MM, W – 680mm,L – 900mm
Heater 150 X 2 + 300 X 2
Drive 1 HP single-phase ( Delta)

The post FFS Four Side Sealing Machine appeared first on Zara International- Pouch Packing Machine, Food Processing Machine.

item.title: Air Bubble Bag Making Machine (Blister Pouch Packing)
item.dc:creator: zarainternational
item.description:
Brand: Zara International
  • Max & Min Size of Bag: 700 mm * 50 mm / 1000 mm  / 2000 mm (3 Types of Models)
  • Product Type: Air Bubble Bag Making Machine (Blister Pouch Packing)
  • General Use: Air Bubble Bag Manufacturing (Blister Pouch Packing)
  • Automatic Grade: Semi-Automatic
  • Drive Type: Electric
  • Bag Type: Air Bubble Bag (Blister Pouch Packing)
  • Computerized: No
  • Material: Air Bubble Sheets

The post Air Bubble Bag Making Machine (Blister Pouch Packing) appeared first on Zara International- Pouch Packing Machine, Food Processing Machine.
item.content:encoded:
BUBBLE BAG MAKING MACHINE (Blister Pouch Packing)

Fostered with a team of highly accomplished experts, we have been apt to manufacture and export a broad range of Automatic Air Bubble Bag Making Machines (Blister Pouch Packing). These machines are manufactured by making use of top-quality materials components and advanced technology in obedience to industry codes standards.

We use it for making bubble airbags that have diverse applications in multiple packaging requirements. Consumers can avail of these Automatic Air Bubble Bag Making Machines (Blister Pouch Packing) from us at industry-dominant prices within the promised time frame.

Having our state-of-the-art manufacturing unit that is comprised of the latest machinery, we can fabricate various high-operating machines. We also subject these machines to stringent quality tests prior to shipping. Moreover, our expert professionals endeavor to offer an innovative range of designs as per the market trends to lend optimal satisfaction to our clients.

Features:

    • High functionality
    • Long service life
    • Excellent performance

SPECIFICATION 

  • Product: EPE, AIR BUBBLE Roll, Blister Pouch Packing
  • Max & Min Size of Bag: 700 mm * 50 mm / 1000 mm  / 2000 mm
  • 3 Side Seal L-SHAPE degree folder assembly for preparing bags EPE / air bubble for 700 mm model
  • Digitally length control with Zero time error for changing the size of the bag.
  • EPE / air bubble is open from ONE side, two side seals from the machine, and one side fold from the folder.
  • Heavy duty and accurate automatically pulling system because of imported rubber rollers.
  • Heavy Duty Cladding Rollers for moving rolls easily.
  • Complete Programming Logically Controlled System (P.L.C) (Makers: OMRON, SIEMENS or Jiyalal)
  • Stainless Steel SS front table for Collection of production Bubble Bags.
  • Imported Coating Heaters for the safety of bubble / EPE roll sticky nature
  • Digital Touch Screen Display for parameter setting of the machine (Maker: OMRON, SIEMENS or Jiyalal)
  • Gear Box with connected load 1.0 (Maker: ROTOMOTIVE, BONVARIO)
  • Servo Controlled Motor 0.75 HP for 700 mm size roll (Maker: OMRON SIEMENS)
  • Speed capacity up to 30 Bags per min (Bubble up to 25 Bags)-Depends on the roll’s thickness and size
  • Variable sealing time to suit different thicknesses and different materials types.
  • Connected Load available three phases as well as single-phase as per customer requirement.
  • Construction: All-Around Mild Steel Covered with a painted border
  • Adjustable sealing temperature-time through P.L.C.
  • Pneumatic Technology used for efficient pouch sealing and cutting.
  • Heavy-Duty Aluminum Grade Pneumatic Cylinders for sealing pouches (Maker: SMC)
  • The weight of the machine should be 340* Kgs (Approx) including the folder
  • Air Compressor required 3 – 4 CF/M with 6 kg/BAR Pressure. (As per Capacity requirements)

The post Air Bubble Bag Making Machine (Blister Pouch Packing) appeared first on Zara International- Pouch Packing Machine, Food Processing Machine.
